product.title: CC1101 Wireless RF Transceiver Board Module 315/433/868/915MHZ M115 Long Distance Transmission Antenna For FSK GFSK ASK OOK MSK
product.description:
CC1101 Wireless RF Transceiver Board 315MHZ 433MHZ 868MHZ 915MHZ SMA Antenna Wireless Module 30mA GFSK MSK Modulation


 
CC1101 433MHZ

100% brand new and high quality

Continuous frequency band extension:
CC1101: 387-464 MHz and 779-928 MHz.
 
Basic Features:
1. Working voltage :1.8-3.6V.
2. Operating frequency:(Module:387-464MHZ) Default working frequency: 433Mhz.
3. Instantaneous maximum working current: <30mA.
4. Maximum transmit power: 10 (+10dBm).
5. Support 2-FSK, GFSK and MSK modulation.
6. Receiver sensitivity -110dBm at 1200 baud.
7. Minimum operating speed 1.2kbps, the highest 500kbps.
8. Separate 64-byte RX and TX data FIFO buffer.
9. Built-in hardware CRC error detection ensures reliable data transmission.
10. Support RSSI signal strength detection and carrier sense function.
11. Low power consumption.
12. Mailing Address (256) Operating frequency can be programmed via SPI.
13. Programmable output power, for all the support frequencies up to +10 dBm.
14. WOR feature can be set to standby, the proportion receiving state timer switch time to reduce power consumption.
15. Fast frequency synthesizer with proper frequency hopping system.
 
Note:
Size for manual measurement, there may be a 0 to 2 cm error, belongs to the normal phenomenon.
And due to the difference between different monitors, the picture may not reflect the actual color of the item. Thank you!
 
Package includes:
1Pc x Wireless Module
 


 

CC1101 868MHZ Revision

multi-channel transceiver @ 868MHz
support FSK, GFSK, ASK / OOK and MSK
  configurable data rate: 1.2k to 500kps
independent 64-byte RX and TX data FIFOs
support radio wake
supports automatic clear channel assessment
efficient SPI Interface
low power supply (1.8V-3.6 V)   
 
 
Package Included:
1 x  CC1101 Wireless Module Long Distance Transmission Antenna 868MHZ M115

USB CC1101 433MHZ

 

USB interface wireless module/serial communication/CC1101 wireless module

 

Module introduction:

USB1100-232 wireless module, using TI's high-performance CC110L wireless communication chip, is

A serial port wireless data transmission module with USB interface, specially designed for wireless data transmission application of host computer equipment

And design, can be matched with our CC1101 series of modules (can be combined with

RF1100-232 data transmission module is seamlessly matched), mainly used in lower-level

The wireless reception and communication between the computer (MCU) and the host computer (PC computer end)

Sending, or two USB1100-232 modules can be used to achieve two

Wireless communication between PCs. The external interface of the module is USB, and the internal is virtual

Simulated serial port, development and application is simpler and more convenient than USB2.0

 

Basic performance and features:

1. Built-in amplifier circuit, the maximum transmit power of the module is 100mW

2. Work in 433MHz free ISM frequency band, license-free use (420MHz ~ 440MHz)

3. High anti-interference ability and low bit error rate, based on FSK modulation method, using efficient forward correction

Error and channel interleaving coding technology, improve the ability of data to resist random interference and burst interference

4. Support transparent data transmission and DL/645 protocol. Provide a transparent data interface, can adapt to

Any standard or non-standard user agreement. Automatically filter out fake data generated in the air (received

issued)

5. Maximum 256 programmable channels (20MHz frequency band). Can follow 200KHz interval frequency

Points can provide at least 256 channels to meet the user's various communication combinations.

6. Using the USB interface, the USB port of the PC port can directly take power without external power supply, which is very convenient

Constructing the Wireless Communication Between PC and SCM System

7. Large data buffer. The interface baud rate is equal to the effective baud rate in the air, providing 3 kinds of users

Optional baud rate: 4800, 9600, 19200bps (the interface rate can be set up to

19200bps); the data format is 8N1/8E1/8O1 user-defined, and the maximum transmission time is 30

Byte data frame, user programming is more flexible

8. Intelligent data control, users do not need to compile redundant programs, just send/receive data from the interface

Yes, other operations such as air receiving/transmitting conversion, control, etc., are automatically completed by the RF1100-232 module

9. Communication distance: In the case of straight line, one end is connected to the PC, and the other end is connected to the microcontroller.

The transmission distance of 9600bps rate can reach 300 meters (after the module is connected to the PC, due to the electromagnetic Interference will have a certain distance shortened)

 

USB1100-232 parameter configuration:

The parameters of the USB1100-232 can be modified and read through the PC through the configuration software developed by our company (the driver needs to be installed first):

 

Precautions:

1. The module antenna should not be too close to the microcontroller to prevent interference with the microcontroller and cause data confusion, etc.

2. Communication must pay attention to the delay problem, because the wireless communication transmitter receives from the terminal equipment

After a certain amount of data, or waiting for a certain period of time without new data, there is a delay of tens to hundreds of milliseconds from the wireless communication transmitter to the wireless communication receiver (the specific delay is determined by the serial port rate, air rate and data packet rate. It also takes a certain amount of time from the wireless communication receiving end to the terminal device, but the delay is fixed under the same conditions

3. The serial port rate generally needs to be less than or equal to the air rate, if the serial port rate is greater than the air baud

The data rate must be delayed after sending and receiving data once, otherwise there will be data overflow and data loss.

4. This module supports one-to-many communication, and the channel selection and air rate settings of all modules are consistent

At this time, data can be sent to and received from each other. At this time, one module sends, and all modules receive the same data. If the data needs to be sent to the specified module, the data can be added to the address code, and when the device receives the data, it is judged whether the address is the address of the device, and if not, it is discarded. Note that one-to-many communication can only send one and the other receive, not more than one at the same time, otherwise it will interfere with each other

5. The nominal maximum communication distance of the wireless module refers to the communication between the MCU and the MCU

The distance achieved, when one end or both sides are connected to the PC, due to the computer radiation has a greater effect on the radio frequency.

Large electromagnetic interference, the distance will be greatly shortened, such as RF1100-232 micro power module single chip microcomputer

Communication between them" is 200 meters, and when connecting to a PC, it can only reach around 100 meters. This USB module has built-in amplification to offset the influence of electromagnetic interference, and the actual communication distance can reach 200-300 meters

CC1101 868MHZ

Module description:

The RL1101-868 module is a micro-power UHF wireless transceiver, which works in the 433MISM frequency band and can be widely used in AMR-automatic meter reading.

digital, consumer electronics, remote control, low power telemetry, home and building automation, wireless alarm and security systems, industrial

Industry monitoring and control, wireless sensor network, wireless wake-up function, low-power handheld terminal products, etc.

 

Features

◇Multi-channel transceiver@868MHz

◇Support FSK,GFSK,ASK/OOKandMSK

◇Configurable data rate: 1.2k to 500kps

◇ Independent 64-byte RX and TX data FIFOs

◇Support radio wake-up

◇Support automatic interference-free channel evaluation

◇Efficient SPI interface

◇Low power supply (1.8V–3.6V)

Application field

◇Two-way remote keyless entry

◇AMR-automatic meter reading system

◇Home/building automation

◇Wireless light adjustment

◇Wireless alarm and security system

◇Low power telemetry

◇Industrial control and monitoring

◇Wireless sensor network

color: red

1*433M CC1101 Wireless Transmitter Receiver Module nRF905/SX1212/Si4432


CC1101 433MHZ Green

Product introduction:

The product adopts the chip CC1101, which can be widely used in the Internet of Things, industrial control, medical treatment, security alarm, data acquisition, smart home, water and electricity meter reading and other occasions.

 

Product parameters:

⑴Receive sensitivity: -116dBm/0.6kbps

(2) Working temperature: -30℃~85℃.

(3) Working voltage: DC1.9~3.6V.

(4) Communication distance: 380 meters.

(5) Maximum power: 10mW.

(6) Center frequency: 433MHZ.

(7) The open transmission distance is 300 meters to 500 meters.

(8) Color: Green.

(9) Total product length: 68.00mm (including antenna)

 

Features:

⑴) Using SPI interface.

(2) Wireless wake-up function; support low-power electric carbon wave activation function, wirelessly wake up devices in low-power sleep state.

(3) Low current consumption: 15.6mA in receive mode, less than 0.5uA in sleep mode.

 

Pin function:

(1) GND: negative pole of power supply.

(2) VCC: Positive power supply.

(3) CSN: module chip select pin, used to start an SPI communication.

(4) SCK: module SPI bus clock.

(5) MOSI: Module SPI data input pin.

(6) MISO: module SPI data output pin.

(7) GDO0: module information output pin.

(8) GDO2: module information output pin.
